SearchCarrierEventAbbreviatedRecord.MainSQL: SELECT +Option1 CSTID , CSTSTAT as 상태 , LOTID , PROCID , EQPTID , PORT_ID , RACK_ID , EVENT_CODE , EVENT_TYPE_CODE as ETC , TRF_END_CODE AS TEC , FINL_TO_EQPTID as TO_EQPT_ID , FINL_TO_PORT_ID as TO_PORT_ID , INSUSER , CONVERT(CHAR(23), INSDTTM, 20) AS INSDTTM , CONVERT(CHAR(23), UPDDTTM, 20) AS UPDDTTM FROM TB_MHS_TRF_EVENT_HIST with(nolock) where 1=1 +Option2 +Option3 ORDER BY INSDTTM DESC
